text: Hello everyone, I need help to disable cookie tracking in HubSpot application as we are using third party cookies tracking. I have tried deactivating cookies, but still browser is tracking cookies even before user's cookie consent. Can anyone suggest me if I am missing anything.

Thanks Eric. I had found this resource, too but it's not clear how to replicate the complete standard inbox with all of its channels in one consolidated view. Is my understanding correct that I would need to patch various requests defining all actors, all threads etc?

There must be a single endpoint or pre-made params that would just bring this to life easily?
